note.p: Career: Freemason, member, 1802, Lodge Star in the East No 77, subsequently No 67, Calcutta
Notes: 'Saml Carlisle' is Samuel Goodenough, Bishop of Carlisle
Library and Museum of Freemasonry, 'Freemasons and the Royal Society: Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010, page 15
